properties.description: Copies the Trade Excel file to Azure blob storage container

activities.name: Each IMO
activities.description: Copies each IMO number in the lookup table to a separate API request.

scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.VesselFinderData_Historical','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE SupplyChain.VesselFinderData_Historical

	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.VesselFinderData_Historical
	FROM		[RAW].[VesselFinderData] v
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Index]
					,			[Vessel IMO]
					,			[Mothervessel IMO]
					,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
					FROM		SupplyChain.ShippingContracts
					WHERE		ISNULL([Mothervessel IMO],[Vessel IMO]) IS NOT NULL
					AND			ISNULL([Mothervessel IMO],[Vessel IMO]) <> ''

				) s
	ON			CASE
					WHEN [Vessel Transfer Indicator] = 'X'
						THEN [Vessel IMO]
					ELSE ISNULL([Mothervessel IMO],[Vessel IMO])
				END = v.[IMO]


	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.VesselData','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE SupplyChain.VesselData

	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.VesselData
	FROM		SupplyChain.VesselFinderData_Historical
	WHERE		[IMO] IS NOT NULL
	AND			[Live Shipment Indicator] = 1

	DROP TABLE [RAW].[VesselFinderData]

activities.name: Each IMO
activities.description: Copies each IMO number in the lookup table to a separate API request.

activities.name: Vessel Portcalls JSON Blob Get Metadata

dependsOn.activity: Vessel Portcalls JSON Blob Get Metadata

scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.VesselFinderPortCalls_Historical','U') IS NOT NULL
        DROP TABLE SupplyChain.VesselFinderPortCalls_Historical

	SELECT		*
	INTO		[SupplyChain].[VesselFinderPortCalls_Historical]
	FROM		[RAW].[VesselFinderPortCalls] v
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Index]
					,			[Vessel IMO]
					,			[Mothervessel IMO]
					,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
					FROM		SupplyChain.ShippingContracts
					WHERE		ISNULL([Mothervessel IMO],[Vessel IMO]) IS NOT NULL
					AND			ISNULL([Mothervessel IMO],[Vessel IMO]) <> ''

				) s
	ON			CASE
					WHEN [Vessel Transfer Indicator] = 'X'
						THEN [Vessel IMO]
					ELSE ISNULL([Mothervessel IMO],[Vessel IMO])
				END = v.[IMO]


	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.VesselFinderPortCalls','U') IS NOT NULL
        DROP TABLE SupplyChain.VesselFinderPortCalls

	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.VesselFinderPortCalls
	FROM		[SupplyChain].[VesselFinderPortCalls_Historical]
	WHERE		[Live Shipment Indicator] = 1

	DROP TABLE [RAW].[VesselFinderPortCalls]
